title: Revisiting the Original Metroid From A Modern Perspective | Behind Schedule
description:
In the final Behind Schedule episode on The Escapist, Jesse takes a look at the original Metroid (1986) from a modern perspective and asks if it still holds up for today's audience.

Check out Jesse's Patreon. https://www.patreon.com/JesseGalena
